abstract: Sharp, 3M, Corning, E-Ink and Mitsubishi talked with David Pogue about the future of display technologies earlier this month at the Consumer Electronics Show.
snippet: Sharp, 3M, Corning, E-Ink and Mitsubishi talked with David Pogue about the future of display technologies earlier this month at the Consumer Electronics Show.
lead_paragraph: At the Consumer Electronics Show a couple weeks ago, I hosted a panel on future display technologies. There were five panelists--executives from Sharp, 3M, Corning, E-Ink and Mitsubishi.

headline.kicker: From the Desk of David Pogue
